info.name: thermochronology
info.description:
Floor undergo a daily cycle of temperature, plus the yearly cycle of seasons, plus the longer climatologic variations  ( Milankovic , etc ).
The heat diffusion propagates the filtered information in depth, which can be measured to read the past.
